articles.description: The coins, found during kitchen renovations in East Yorkshire, have attracted global interest.
articles.content:
A treasure trove of more than 260 gold coins discovered by a couple beneath their kitchen floor during renovations has sold for £754,000 at auction.

articles.title: Great British Bake Off accused of cultural appropriation in Mexican week - The Guardian
articles.description: Chefs say the episode, featuring sombreros and maracas, takes perceptions of the culture back years
articles.content: The Great British Bake Off has been accused of cultural appropriation after a Mexican-themed episode in which the hosts sported sombreros, shook maracas and relied on cuisine cliches such as tacos an… [+5819 chars]
